department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: RFP for 90 wood stoves Alpine CS14 or equivalent
description: The purpose of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to acquire 90 wood stoves Alpine CS14 or equivalent, including delivery located in St-Jean-Sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================

**Title:** RFP - Acquisition of Wood Stoves Alpine CS14 or Equivalent for DND St-Jean
--------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS3734668523-Doc3735492649

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** November 7, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2022, at 14:00 EST

**Procurement Category:** Goods

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Regions of Delivery:** Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada

**Contracting Entity:**
=====================

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Government
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity:**
==================

* Department of National Defence (DND)
* 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information:**
======================

* Pierre-Luc Dube, SPAC/PSPC
* pierre-luc.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Description:**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of 90 wood stoves Alpine CS14 or equivalent, including delivery, located in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 6, 2022, at 14:00 EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Additional Information:**
-------------------------

* The procurement method is competitive and open to all qualified suppliers.
* The selection criteria are lowest price.
* The regions of delivery are Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada.
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). for participating and welfare of respondents to this RFP.

A request for proposal is now available online at: "http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14565532?extsite=MTQ1NjU1MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg=="
